name: Access Compliance Dashboard - Client Admin
description: Client Admin users can navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module from the home page

background.text: I am on the application home page
I am logged in as a Client Admin user

scenarios.name: Client Admin successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page

steps.text: I am on the home page
I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should display the compliance icon
the module should display the "Compliance Dashboard" title

scenarios.name: Client Admin successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard

steps.text: I can see the Compliance Dashboard module on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page
the page URL should contain compliance dashboard

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module displays correct visual elements

steps.text: I am viewing the home page
I locate the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should be clearly visible
the compliance icon should be displayed prominently
the title text should be readable and properly formatted

scenarios.name: Client Admin can interact with Compliance Dashboard module using keyboard navigation

steps.text: I am on the home page
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module using the Tab key
the module should receive focus
I press the Enter key
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module remains accessible after page refresh

steps.text: I am on the home page
I refresh the page
I should still see the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should remain clickable
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page

scenarios.name: Multiple clicks on Compliance Dashboard module work correctly

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page
I navigate back to the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module again
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page again

scenarios.name: Non-Client Admin user cannot see Compliance Dashboard module

steps.text: I am logged in as a regular user
I am on the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
the compliance icon should not be visible
the "Compliance Dashboard" title should not be displayed

scenarios.name: Unauthenticated user cannot access Compliance Dashboard module

steps.text: I am not logged in
I navigate to the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be redirected to the login page

scenarios.name: Error handling when Compliance Dashboard is temporarily unavailable

steps.text: I am on the home page
the Compliance Dashboard service is temporarily unavailable
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see an appropriate error message
I should remain on the current page or be shown a fallback

scenarios.name: Session timeout while accessing Compliance Dashboard

steps.text: I am on the home page
my session has expired
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be redirected to the login page
I should see a session timeout message

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module visibility with minimal screen resolution

steps.text: I am using a device with minimal screen resolution
I am on the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module should still be visible
the module should remain clickable
the title text should not be truncated or overlapped

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module behavior on slow network connection

steps.text: I am on a slow network connection
I am on the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module should eventually load
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see a loading indicator or progress feedback
I should eventually be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module with browser back button navigation

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I am navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page
I click the browser back button
I should return to the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module should still be visible and functional

gherkin_content:
Feature: Access Compliance Dashboard - Client Admin
  Client Admin users can navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module from the home page

  Background:
    Given I am on the application home page
    And I am logged in as a Client Admin user

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Client Admin successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page
    Given I am on the home page
    Then I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the module should display the compliance icon
    And the module should display the "Compliance Dashboard" title

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Client Admin successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard
    Given I can see the Compliance Dashboard module on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page
    And the page URL should contain compliance dashboard

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module displays correct visual elements
    Given I am viewing the home page
    When I locate the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then the module should be clearly visible
    And the compliance icon should be displayed prominently
    And the title text should be readable and properly formatted

  @positive @accessibility
  Scenario: Client Admin can interact with Compliance Dashboard module using keyboard navigation
    Given I am on the home page
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module using the Tab key
    Then the module should receive focus
    When I press the Enter key
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page

  @positive @reliability
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module remains accessible after page refresh
    Given I am on the home page
    When I refresh the page
    Then I should still see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the module should remain clickable
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page

  @positive @interaction
  Scenario: Multiple clicks on Compliance Dashboard module work correctly
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page
    When I navigate back to the home page
    And I click on the Compliance Dashboard module again
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page again

  @negative @authorization
  Scenario: Non-Client Admin user cannot see Compliance Dashboard module
    Given I am logged in as a regular user
    When I am on the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the compliance icon should not be visible
    And the "Compliance Dashboard" title should not be displayed

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Unauthenticated user cannot access Compliance Dashboard module
    Given I am not logged in
    When I navigate to the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And I should be redirected to the login page

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: Error handling when Compliance Dashboard is temporarily unavailable
    Given I am on the home page
    And the Compliance Dashboard service is temporarily unavailable
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should see an appropriate error message
    And I should remain on the current page or be shown a fallback

  @negative @session
  Scenario: Session timeout while accessing Compliance Dashboard
    Given I am on the home page
    And my session has expired
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be redirected to the login page
    And I should see a session timeout message

  @edge-case @responsive
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module visibility with minimal screen resolution
    Given I am using a device with minimal screen resolution
    When I am on the home page
    Then the Compliance Dashboard module should still be visible
    And the module should remain clickable
    And the title text should not be truncated or overlapped

  @edge-case @performance
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module behavior on slow network connection
    Given I am on a slow network connection
    When I am on the home page
    Then the Compliance Dashboard module should eventually load
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should see a loading indicator or progress feedback
    And I should eventually be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page

  @alternative-flow @navigation
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module with browser back button navigation
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    And I am navigated to the Compliance Dashboard page
    When I click the browser back button
    Then I should return to the home page
    And the Compliance Dashboard module should still be visible and functional
